info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 17 at 9:47AM CDT until August 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago IL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois...
Du Page River at Shorewood affecting Will County.
For the Du Page River...including Plainfield, Shorewood...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Du Page River from IL-59 in Plainfield downstream to confluence with Des Plaines River, including the Shorewood gauge.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to Monday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Clark Drive threatened in Shorewood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 16.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 15.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
A Flood Warning means water levels above flood stage are imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers and streams in the warned area should take immediate precautions to protect life and property.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued by late tonight.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING
